metadata.title: CVE-2014-8399 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The default configuration in systemd-shim 8 enables the Abandon debuggingclause, which allows local users to cause a denial of service viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

systemd-shim - 6-2bzr1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: systemd-shim package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6-2bzr1').
